title: Sponsorship affidavits (I-864)
retention: Until citizenship or 40 qualifying work quarters
dataVerified: Sponsor name/signature, beneficiary name, income documentation, household size
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake affidavits of support. Domain binding verifies sponsor/USCIS. Green card sponsorship requirement. Public charge prevention. Enforceable contract. Prevents sponsorship fraud. For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks.
